question: Display patios and verandas with 50 seats.
sql_query1:
SELECT Patios.name
FROM Patios
WHERE Patios.Number_of_Seats = 50
UNION
SELECT Verandas.name
FROM Verandas
WHERE Verandas.Number_of_Seats = 50
sql_query2:
SELECT Patios.name
FROM Patios
UNION
SELECT Verandas.name
FROM Verandas
WHERE Verandas.Number_of_Seats = 50
interpretation1: Can you show both patios and verandas each with 50 seats?
interpretation2: List all patios and also display verandas with 50 seats.
